title: Major refactoring of the way we store and represent data. Changed from a two…
message: Major refactoring of the way we store and represent data. Changed from a two dimensional array for the board to using BitSets. This resulted in major changes accross the board. However the performance gains are incredible. The search tree went from depth 3 to depth 8, which is unreal. More optimizations to come.
